item.title: Auto Alcher, First time using SCAR
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

It isn’t spam, it was good for a first attempt.

Also, to include an include, type “{.include si.txt}”, si.txt being the name of the include, all includes are loaded from c:/program files/scar 2.03/includes.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Alcher, First time using SCAR
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Ok, cheating in runescape has come to the stage where it’s no longer user friendly, clickmouse and movemouse will get you banned.

You should start by including an include. An include is a file that contains lots of custom procedures, SRL being the latest include. From there(presuming you chose SRL) you can use the Mouse(x, y, randx, randy, true) to move and click, MMouse(x, y, randx, randy) to move your mouse.

Try to use more random wait times and break out of the loop(try “if NotLoggedIn then Break”).

And last of all, standards make scripts look pretty.

Read full topic
item.source: Auto Alcher, First time using SCAR
